goal.en: “The objective of this course is to equip students with basic mathematical knowledge to understand the economic literature and, furthermore, to enable them to deal with economic problems using mathematical models. The following topics will be included in this year: sets, functions, matrix algebra, differential and integral calculus, differential equations, difference equations, optimal control theory, and so forth.“

“1 Introduction
2 Multivariate Calculus
3 Young Theorem
4 First Test
5 Eigenvalue and Eigenvector
6 Implicit Function Theorem
7 Optimization
8 Second Test
9 Optimization
10 Constrained Optimization
11 Homogeneous Functions
12 Third Test
13 Differential Equations
14 Difference Equations
15 Simultaneous Equations
16 Final Test“
